Posts.Content: Julia46uk wrote: Hello, I finished my radiation treatment on 3/12 and was doing pretty decent with skin until I developed a skin broken rush on my last day of treatment. It was getting worse and I saw my RO today who give me silver sultadiazine cream. So if you had to use it how long it took to get better? Just enough to be able to put the bra on. My biggest issue is the crease line under the breast. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Silver Sultadiazine - how fast is healing? Julia46uk Julia46uk
